name: Enchanting Emotions
description:
-Made for the Global Game Jam 2022-
Theme: Duality

A small mage in training is learning how to control its magic which responds to its emotions by solving puzzles while trying to get around and helping others.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Un pequeño mago en entrenamiento está aprendiendo a controlar su magia, que responde a sus emociones, resolviendo puzzles mientras trata de seguir su camino y ayudar a otros.

Controls:

  • A/D = Movement / Movimiento
  • W = Jump / Salto
  • Q = Emotion switch / Cambio de emoción
  • E = Magic skill / Habilidad mágica

Credits:

Free-to-use Music made by Pix: https://www.youtube.com/c/Pix-music

Title Screen: "Ooh! a Fly, wait... It isn't"

Levels: "A Lonely Cherry Tree"

Character and Sound Design, Sprites and Animation: Nicolás González

Background and Objects Sprites: Jefferson Sartorio

Game Design and Programming: Jesús González
